titleStmt.title: Venus in the cloister, Or The nun in her smock. In curious dialogues, addressed to the Lady Abbess of Loves Paradice, / by the Abbot Du Prat. ; Done out of French.
Venus dans le cloitre ou La religieuse en chemise. English
titleStmt.author: Barrin, Jean, ca. 1640-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Rodes, next dore to the Bear Tavern near Bride-Lane in Fleet-Street,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Venus dans le cloitre ou La religieuse en chemise.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
